product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Axis 5 Floor Saver Tent Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: This coated nylon footprint, used underneath your ALPS Mountaineering Axis 5 tent, protects its floor from abrasion and wear. Designed just a tad smaller than the tent floor, it's the perfect size to prevent pooling of water under the tent during rainy weather. Comes in stuff sack with drawcord and toggle closure. Special buy.
short_description: This coated nylon footprint, used underneath your ALPS Mountaineering Axis 5 tent, protects its floor from abrasion and wear.
